item.title: Agent Trainer Case Study: Building Your Own Writing Workflow with Clawdbot
item.description: With Clawdbot’s rebranding to @moltbot, the initial excitement has started to fade. I wonder how many people have drifted back to their daily lives, and how many have stayed behind as “new species” left by the receding tide, ready to explore this new continent.
